question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math> dissociates as <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfenced><mo>⇌</mo><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfenced><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Cl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfenced></math> <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn></math> moles of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math> are placed in a <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>200</mn></math> litre vessel which contains <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn></math> moles of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and is maintained at <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>600</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math>. The equilibrium pressure is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>.</mo><mn>46</mn><mo> </mo><mi>atm</mi></math>. The equilibrium constant <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub></math> for the dissociation of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math> is___<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>. (nearest integer) (Given: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>.</mo><mn>082</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math> atm <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo> </mo><mi>mol</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>; Assume ideal gas behaviour)

solution.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo>⇌</mo><mo> </mo><msub><mi>PCl</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Cl</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"/><mn>5</mn><mi>mole</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo>-</mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo>-</mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi>Intial</mi><mo> </mo><mi>moles</mi><mspace mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi>Equilibrium</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"/><mi>Total</mi><mo> </mo><mi>number</mi><mo> </mo><mi>of</mi><mo> </mo><mi>moles</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"/><mi>As</mi><mo> </mo><mi>number</mi><mo> </mo><mi>of</mi><mo> </mo><mi>moles</mi><mo> </mo><mi>of</mi><mo> </mo><mi>Nitrogen</mi><mo> </mo><mi>gas</mi><mo> </mo><mi>added</mi><mo> </mo><mi>is</mi><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"/><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>total</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>PV</mi><mi>RT</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>.</mo><mn>46</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo> </mo><mn>200</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>.</mo><mn>082</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mn>600</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"/><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"/><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"/><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mstyle><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn><mo>.</mo><mn>46</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mi
